user.title: Tautulli Active Streams
user.description:
To find your API key, open the Tautulli webpage and navigate to **Settings** → **Web Interface**. The API key is at the bottom of that page.

**Examples of URL formats:**
- **Local (HTTP)**: `http://192.168.0.10:8181`
- **Remote / Reverse Proxy (HTTPS)**: `https://tautulli.example.com`

data.server_name: Enter a friendly name for your Tautulli server (optional).
data.url: Enter the full URL of your Tautulli server (including port if necessary).
data.verify_ssl: Enable SSL verification? Disable if using a self-signed certificate.

advanced.title: Tautulli Advanced Setup
advanced.description: Configure how often to poll Tautulli, how many sensors to create, and whether to enable watch-history statistics. You can also enable Plex integration here.

data.session_interval: How often (in seconds) to refresh active streams?
data.num_sensors: Number of sensors to create for monitoring active streams.
data.image_proxy: Use Image Proxy? (Proxy images via Home Assistant).
data.enable_ip_geolocation: Enable IP Geolocation? (Use IP-to-location mapping from Tautulli).
data.enable_plex_integration: Enable Plex integration for advanced features?
data.stats_month_to_date: Use Month-to-Date? (Ignores day range and starts from the 1st of the current month).
data.statistics_days: Number of days to include (ignored when Month-to-Date is enabled).
data.statistics_interval: How often (in seconds) to refresh watch-history for statistics?

plex.title: Plex Integration Setup
plex.description: Enter your Plex information for advanced features. (You can find your Plex token by checking your Plex server logs or browser network requests.)
